title: PT 3: Should She Tell Her Boyfriend About This Life-Changing Secret?
description:
Over 15 years ago, her boyfriend's sister told her a MAJOR family secret about her boyfriend. At the time, she was dating him so it was easy for her to swear never to tell a soul.
But this secret is lifechanging, and she thinks he needs to know this information. So did she tell him over the weekend?
